title: Rosetti's Garden
marks:
Signature, Date, Inscription, Stamp and Sticker
 LLC, in black ink: [Jo PENNELL / CHELSEA \'84]
text: Joseph Pennell had a prolific career as an illustrator of books, stories, and travel articles for the Century Magazine and Scribner's Magazine.  This pen and ink drawing of the artist English Pre-Rephaelite artist Dante Gabriel Rossetti's garden was printed in the Century Magazine in 1884.
description: view of a garden with plants in foreground; bench (?) at left; sculptures at right and center in distance; trees at left and right with portion of building visible between them; heart-shaped composition
creditline: Gift of Edith and Norman Garmezy
